column1: A service to honor the life of Mr. Conley Wayne Guy will be conducted at 3:00 P.M. Saturday
column3: 2015 in the Sunset Chapel of Hathaway-Percy Funeral and Cremation Services with Rev. Dean Presnell officiating. Music will be under the direction of Mr. Johnny Palmer.
